Text: Just downloaded. Trust me, this is a clean and safe version, I've virus scanned it. Thank you EverybodyLies. :)

recommended.

Torrent works great.

Had a quick question though: is there a way to really minimize the size of the video files? An almost 7 minute video was 10GB. I have a program to compress the files (got it down to 1.9GB), but it's quite time consuming and just seems inefficient.

And if there isn't a real good way to get the files to not be so space consuming, is there another good program to use for game capture?
Is there a specfic video converter that you would recommend?
Downloaded this and immediately got a popup from AVG saying this was infected with a win32/cryptor.

Works great!  I tried another torrent for a later version of Fraps, but it wouldn't record my desktop; only in-game.  This one works much better!

I'd totally buy Fraps if it wasn't so expensive.  $37 just for FPS and video recording? no thanks
